mapper.select: SELECT B.ticket_id FROM `order` A INNER JOIN ticket B ON A.order_id = B.order_id WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY B.created_at DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT D.restaurant_name AS restaurantName, SUM(OD.menu_count) AS menuCount, SUM(H.`point`) AS totalAmount, E.reservation_people_count AS personCount, OD.created_at AS reservationTime, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT F.menu_name SEPARATOR ', ') AS menuNames , G.ticket_status AS ticketStatus FROM `order` C INNER JOIN restaurant D ON C.restaurant_id = D.restaurant_id LEFT JOIN order_detail OD ON C.order_id = OD.order_id LEFT JOIN reservation E ON C.order_id = E.order_id INNER JOIN restaurant_menu F ON OD.menu_id = F.menu_id INNER JOIN ticket G ON C.order_id = G.order_id INNER JOIN user_payment_member H ON C.order_id = H.order_id WHERE G.ticket_id = #{ticketId} GROUP BY C.order_id;
mapper.delete: DELETE A FROM ticket A INNER JOIN `order` B ON A.order_id = B.order_id INNER JOIN reservation C ON B.order_id = C.order_id WHERE TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, C.created_at, NOW()) <= 1 AND A.order_id = #{orderId}
mapper.select: SELECT ticket_id AS ticketId, order_id AS orderId, expired_date AS expiredDate , ticket_status AS ticketStatus, use_date AS useDate, created_at AS createdAt FROM ticket WHERE order_id = #{orderId}
mapper.update: UPDATE ticket SET ticket_status = 1 , use_date = NOW() WHERE ticket_id = #{ticketId}
